divs: Sighting DetailsThis may have ben in march or possibly april of 92 or 93 I was laid off from work and It was a windy day. My children were young so I thought they would like to fly a kite. They were too small so I was flying the kite. The sky was clear blue with no clouds anyware. I was watching the kite and saw the the object off to the south of where the kite was. I looked at it and was blimp shaped but it was not the blimp that flys around by goodyear. It was much larger just a silvery color and seemed to be extremely high. The wind died down and the kite started to drop. I pulled in the kite, and the blimp was gone. Nothing was visible in the clear sky.
Summary: looking up at a kite I saw a large silvery blimp shape object I looked away and it was gone.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Beach City
There were no other sightings in Beach City on or around March 15th 1993
